notes.text: I think I got criticism for the Mirror Walls, but I find it helps in match ups where the enemy has destruction immunity of sorts (CA, Archfiends, etc). If I had more Atlantis, I would probably rep the Abyss card. More fishermans is nice, but I would probably rep the ships with one if I did get a third. I think two is healthy though. This deck is more powerful than it should be because opponents sleep on the second effect of SSA and don't understand the remove-from-play abuse.
